attributes.additional_details: I know from talking to family, friends and work colleagues that I’m not the only person that feels this way sign this petition, get your friends family, work colleagues on board email, text, WhatsApp,  facebook let them know about this and let's get "everyone " well again!
attributes.background: Why can't Gp's get back to normal  this isn't progress  we've gone back 73 yrs , this isn't providing medical treatment for all it's just providing for people who can use or have access to  the Internet and it's wrong,  let's get back to human contact where it's needed ........ AT YOUR GP SURGERY!!

rejection.details:
Decisions on when to offer a face to face, as opposed to a remote, consultation are an operational decision for GPs and NHS Trusts.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
